Metadata.Title: Assign Information Security Responsibilities
Metadata.Author: Serge Batchilo, Jason Taylor, Joe Basirico

Content.Data:
Applies to

  • PCI DSS Requirement 12.5
  • PCI DSS Requirement 12.5.1
  • PCI DSS Requirement 12.5.2
  • PCI DSS Requirement 12.5.3
  • PCI DSS Requirement 12.5.4
  • PCI DSS Requirement 12.5.5

What to Do

Assign information security responsibilities.

How

Designate an information security team. Assign responsibility for information security to the Chief Information Security Officer or other qualified member of management. Assign the following responsibilities to formal staff positions in the company or to contractors:

  • Managing policies and procedures
  • Monitoring alerts, reviewing logs, and notifying the appropriate staff
  • Managing incident response procedures
  • Managing user accounts
  • Managing data access control
